name: Godzilla Simplex the Game (Public Alpha)
description:
Godzilla Simplex the game
is my first released open world game that is Godzilla themed

In this game, you can explore the map and play as a kaiju! use kaiju abilities, roars and also you will be able to unlock secret kaijus on the future! this game is in alpha and in constant in development so, here be dragons!

(note: i do not own the kaijus and their roars, they are owned by toho and legendary and i give them the credit, even if the kaiju's design are different and re-made by me)
